$description:
| What does this do? | Ensures spam policies in Exchange Online are set to notifiy administrators when users send or forward spam. All forms of mail forwarding are blocked or disabled. |
| Why should you use this? | Notifies administrators when a sender in the organization has been blocked for sending spam emails. Ensures all forms of automatic email forwarding are disabled. |
| What is the end-user impact? | Users will need to use organizationally approved methods to forward messages. |
| Learn more | [Anti-spam policies](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/security/office-365-security/anti-spam-policies-configure?view=o365-worldwide) [Automatic email forwarding](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/exchange-team-blog/all-you-need-to-know-about-automatic-email-forwarding-in/ba-p/2074888)|
